description.zh-CN: 盒阴影发光效果，搭配脉冲动画和呼吸效果。创造发光粒子系统视觉，展现动态光线互动。，创造发光粒子系统视觉，展现动态光线互动。盒阴影光晕搭配脉冲动画和呼吸效果。生成动态光晕和视觉活力。
description.en-US: Box-shadow glow with pulse animation and breathing creating immersive and engaging digital experiences through thoughtful design principles, modern aesthetics, and user-centered approach to interface creating immersive and engaging digital experiences through thoughtful design principles, modern aesthetics, and user-centered approach to interface development This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. ambient illumination and dynamic light interaction effects. Delivers exceptional visual quality and sophisticated design excellence.
